title: Performance Optimization of Wireless Communication Systems: Deep Learning-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Wireless communication fundamentals (signal processing, channel modeling), basic machine learning concepts, curriculum design experience
context.additional_context: Competency development in optimizing wireless communication systems for specialized language pedagogy

learning_goals: Learners can explain communication system performance evaluation models utilizing RIS (Reconfigurable Intelligent Surface) and MRT (Maximum Ratio Transmission) beamforming principles
Learners can apply deep learning-based optimization methods to determine the optimal number of RIS components for minimizing BLER (Block Error Rate)
Learners can interpret wireless communication performance optimization experiment results using smartphone-based simulation tools in resource-constrained technical environments

resources: Fundamentals of Wireless Communication Theory Textbook
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
